item.title: Installing Docker in Ubuntu 20.10 (Groovy Gorilla)
item.author: Author
item.description:
Ubuntu ❤️ Docker

Hello everyone,

Recently I installed the latest non LTS version of Ubuntu 20.10 Groovy Gorilla, and found it a bit of a hassle to install Docker with this, following the repository tutorial step.
